          <title>
            <string language="es">La raíz cuadrada de un número natural: animación</string>
            <string language="en">The square root of a natural number: animation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Quadratwurzel einer natürlichen Zahl: 
Animation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La racine carrée d'un nombre normal : 
animation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A raiz quadrada de um número natural: 
animation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La radice quadrata di un numero naturale: 
animazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η τετραγωνική ρίζα ενός φυσικού αριθμού: 
ζωτικότητα</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">simulación que construye geométricamente diferentes raíces cuadradas de los primeros naturales, así como la gráfica de la función raíz de x</string>
            <string language="en">simulation which draws a geometrical construction of the square roots of the first natural numbers and graphs the function square root of x</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">construcción</string>
            <string language="en">construction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">natural</string>
            <string language="en">natural</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">gráfica</string>
            <string language="en">graph</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">raíz</string>
            <string language="en">root</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">función</string>
            <string language="en">function</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">cuadrada</string>
            <string language="en">square</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Simulation, die einen geometrischen Aufbau der 
Quadratwurzeln der ersten natürlichen Zahlen zeichnet und die 
Funktion Quadratwurzel von x graphisch darstellt</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">simulation qui dessine une construction 
géométrique des racines carrées des premiers nombres normaux et 
représente graphiquement la racine carrée de fonction de x</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">simulação que desenha uma construção 
geométrica das raizes quadradas dos primeiros números naturais e 
representa graficamente a raiz quadrada da função de x</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">simulazione che dissipa una costruzione 
geometrica delle radici quadrate dei primi numeri naturali e 
rappresenta graficamente la radice quadrata di funzione della x</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προσομοίωση που σύρει μια γεωμετρική κατασκευή των 
τετραγωνικών ριζών των πρώτων φυσικών αριθμών και των γραφικών 
παραστάσεων η τετραγωνική ρίζα λειτουργίας του Χ</string>
          </description>
